data.text: @AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews @AmerAcadPeds your advocacy is making a difference. #ThankYou #bethechange
@AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews Your policies caused mental illness. History will not be kind. Hint: Don’t make policies based on politics instead of confirmed science. https://t.co/4doas9N9Xa
@AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews You’ve lost the trust of many parents during the last 2 years. That’s what you’ve done. Discredit your organization.

@AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews Is this satire? Has any one of you POS read Pfizer's data released last week. Y'all know WE know what you've done, right? Everyone ready for Nuremberg 2.0? 💥💥💥
https://t.co/2p109PDzbO
@AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews Can you show the latest data on speech therapy? Is it higher or lower than before?
@AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews Explain why these milestones have changed? https://t.co/TPvYJ9y0GV

@AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews The same AAP that retracted its letter to reopen schools in August 2020, said babies don’t need to see faces (with no supporting data), called for FDA to approve 5-11 vaccine before additional trial data was complete, and is pushing the vaccine for infection-recovered children? https://t.co/2GuqB6j4u3
@AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews Today it was announced that we have the highest inflation in the past 40 years. So much for your #votekids nonsense. Parents can’t even afford food. Shame on the AAP.

@AmerAcadPeds @AAPNews The AAP has been an absolute disgrace. YOU are directly to blame for the mental health crisis. Your recommendations are based on politics and social trends rather than what is in the best interest of children. https://t.co/LTq8LHXmrV
